## SendableARTH.transferCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferCollateralGainToTrove(): Promise<SentARTHTransaction<S, ARTHReceipt<R, CollateralGainTransferDetails>>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentARTHTransaction](./arth-base.sentarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [ARTHReceipt](./arth-base.arthreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [CollateralGainTransferDetails](./arth-base.collateralgaintransferdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [MAHA reward](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.mahareward.md)<!-- -->.
